FuncDef:
The release-agent command enables the function of sending DHCPv6 Release packets.
The undo release-agent command disables the function of sending DHCPv6 Release packets.
By default, the function of sending DHCPv6 Release packets is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the following situations, the release-agent command can be run to configure the device to send DHCPv6 Release packets to the server:
The device that provides the DHCPv6 relay agent functionality, not the client, needs to directly send Release packets to the DHCP server.The client cannot send Release packets to the DHCPv6 server.

Configuration Impact
If the function of sending DHCPv6 Release packets is enabled, the device will automatically send a DHCPv6 Release packet to the DHCPv6 server when detecting that a user is offline.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
